storyTitle: Phil Spencer is exiting Microsoft as AI executive takes over Xbox
caption: What's next for Xbox? Phil Spencer exits Microsoft as AI exec steps up to lead Xbox. #XboxAI #GamingFuture
narrationScript: Big shakeup at Xbox! Phil Spencer, who led the console giant for years, is exiting. An AI exec is taking over.
imagePrompt: A stark conference room bathed in cold neon light, Phil Spencer silhouetted against digital code walls.
motionPrompt: Slow dolly in on silhouette, backlit by flickering hologram. Pan to reveal shifting digital code.

storyTitle: New Jersey Residents Defeat AI Data Center Plan
caption: Residents gave Big Tech a major pushback — New Jersey defeats AI data center in community win! #BigTech #AI
narrationScript: Big Tech just got challenged by New Jersey residents who blocked a massive AI data center.
imagePrompt: A sprawling abandoned AI data center with shattered glass facade and smoke billowing from ruptured servers.
motionPrompt: Dolly in on shattered glass facade, smoke billowing. Pan to reveal ruptured servers.

storyTitle: AI Becomes the Tone Police for White-Collar Workers
caption: What if your boss isn't the only one judging your tone? AI is the new tone police. #AIInTheWorkspace
narrationScript: Your boss isn't the only one judging your emails anymore. AI tools now analyze your tone.
imagePrompt: A white-collar worker illuminated by the cold glow of a holographic interface above their desk.
motionPrompt: Slow dolly in on tense close-up, subtle pan to follow holographic interface.

caption: Want to know who's watching you online? AgentCheck reveals the AI bot leaderboard. #AI #Cybersecurity
narrationScript: Ever wonder how AI bots behave online? Meet AgentCheck — a leaderboard ranking bots by their posture.
imagePrompt: A metallic leaderboard structure glowing with neon-blue circuitry, holographic data streams dancing.
motionPrompt: Low-angle dolly-in on metallic leaderboard, neon-blue circuitry pulsing.

storyTitle: Delegate – AI Engineering Manager for Async Multitasking
caption: Tired of juggling tasks? Meet Delegate — AI eng manager running async multitasking agents! #AI #ProductivityHacks
narrationScript: Imagine an AI that manages entire teams — no meetings, no delays. Delegate runs async agents to tackle tasks.
imagePrompt: A towering translucent humanoid figure in a vast glowing control room, composed of swirling neon-blue circuitry.
motionPrompt: Slow dolly in on the towering figure, neon circuitry pulsing; smooth tracking shot around it.
